reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Berlitz Center del Peru - English classes for INL. BPA J.L.N. EXPRESS DHL. MOD Office Supplies for FY'15. GATA RAYTHEON INDIA OPTION YR 1. M&R FOR PD&S OFFICERS RESIDENCES. INL[Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services - Other Contractual Services NOC (A, B, C) (ITA) (INS) (FAS)]. MOD ELECTRICITY. Ball Office Products - Small equipment and other s. IGV - Sales taxes for purchases or services to loc. Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services - Other Contractual Services NOC (A, B, C) (ITA) (INS) (FAS). RECURRING PHONE EXPENSES.. PHONE TOLLS. FY16 INL RECURRING CELLPHONE. Tanaka Masami NMN-post assignment charges-NAO. RESIDENTIAL UTULITIES. Reference material- subscription. FY16 INL Petty Cash

description.narrative: Combat transnational terrorism, especially from al-Qa'ida, its affiliates, and adherents using a strategic counterterrorism approach that focuses on 1) countering violent extremism; 2) building the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutions to address threats within their own borders; and 3) building stronger relationships with our partners around the world – in order to engage in a broader, more comprehensive counterterrorism effort that treats civilian institutions, to include the justice sector and law enforcement, as a critical part of building effective partner capacity to counter terrorism.

This award strives to combat transnational terrorism, counter violent extremism, build the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutuions, and build stronger relationships with our partners around the world. This includes Information has been redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions defined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016: the health and security of implementing partners, and the national interest of the United States.. Train, Eval & Oth Related Act. Covers miscellaneous contractual services such as A&E contracts and IT site preparation by the PBA, GSA, and commercial contracts, among other things..
